text: Aleksandr Petrovych Salnikov (; born 3 July 1949 – 17 November 2017) was a Ukrainian basketball player. He was born in Sevastopol, Ukraine. He competed for the Soviet Union in the 1976 Summer Olympics and the 1980 Summer Olympics. Salnikov died on November 17, 2017 at the age of 68.Украинский спорт понес невосполнимую потерю: скончался чемпион-рекордсмен, легенда баскетбола Александр Сальников == References == Category:1949 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Basketball players Category:Soviet sportspeople Category:Medalists at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1980 Summer Olympics
title: Aleksandr Salnikov
